subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Demetris Nichols had 20 points, Josh Wright and Paul Harris each had 12, and No. 23 Syracuse beat Hofstra, 85-60, last night to snap the Pride’s six-game winning streak.
snippet: Demetris Nichols had 20 points, Josh Wright and Paul Harris each had 12, and No. 23 Syracuse beat Hofstra, 85-60, last night to snap the Pride’s six-game winning streak.
